item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
Privacy Policy for Theoretically Josh

At Theoretically Josh, accessible from https://theoreticallyjosh.com, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by Theoretically Josh and how we use it.

If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.

This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in Theoretically Josh. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website. Our Privacy Policy was created with the help of the Free Privacy Policy Generator

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Joshua (Josh) Hagofsky. I began programming when I was 12 years old. My family didn’t have much money. So, the only computer we had was an old Commodore 64 that our aunt gave us. I somehow managed to fry the serial port, which meant no external storage would work. The only thing I could do with it was program in BASIC. Luckily, it came with a book on how to do just that. I would spend hours trying to create simple programs and games, only to loose everything ever time I turned it off. Eventually in high school I began learning C. I was then approached by some teachers to see if I could write some voting software for a mock election. It worked, but looking back, the code was terrible. Anyway I went to college and learned how to get better.

item.title: Consulting
item.description:
Unlock Your Business’s Full Potential

Struggling with inefficiencies or security gaps? My expert consulting services identify bottlenecks and vulnerabilities, delivering tailored recommendations to boost performance and protect your business. From streamlining operations to enhancing cybersecurity, I’ll help you stay ahead.

Why Choose Me? Actionable insights, customized strategies, and proven results.
Ready to Start? Schedule a Free 30-Minute Consultation

Task Automation

Save Time with Smart Automation

Tired of wasting hours on repetitive tasks? I analyze your workflows and implement automation solutions to save time, reduce errors, and let you focus on what matters, growing your business. From simple scripts to complex integrations, I’ll tailor solutions to fit your needs.

item.title: Custom Software Development
item.description:
New Project

Have a game-changing idea? As a full-stack developer, I’ll build your custom software from concept to launch, ensuring it’s scalable, secure, and user-friendly. Let’s turn your vision into reality.

What I Offer: End-to-end development, modern tech stacks, and ongoing support.
Let’s Talk: Request a Project Quote

Update Existing Project

Need new features for your existing software? I’ll enhance your project with seamless integrations and robust functionality, regardless of the language or framework. Keep your software competitive and efficient.

item.title: Projects
item.description:
Here is a list of a some open source projects I manage.

Project Description
awstui A terminal user interface (TUI) for interacting with AWS services, built with Go and Bubble Tea.
Logseq-plugin-harper Plugin for Logseq to provide harper-ls functionality
dots My configuration files for my setup

item.title: Resume
item.description:
Download PDF

Joshua Hagofsky

theoreticallyjosh@gmail.com

Languages

Go, Typescript, Javascript, C#, C/C++, PromQL, Python, Perl, Java

Frameworks & Tools

Angular, AWS, Snowflake, Docker, MySQL, SQL Server, Kubernetes, Openshift, Prometheus, ElasticSearch, Grafana, Consul, Vault, Redis, Kafka

Experience

Ontologics | Vice President of Software Development
April 2021 - July 2025

  • Designed and implemented a full-stack software solution utilizing, Go, Angular, Snowflake, and AWS to analyze patent portfolios and provide key insights, resulting in a 700+% increase in efficiency for legal teams
  • Developed robust data pipelines using Snowflake to ingest and process patent data
  • Utilized CI/CD pipelines (Codepipe & ECS) for automated deployment and scaling of the application
  • Implemented machine learning algorithms (regression models) to determine patent strength and identify emerging technology areas.
  • Worked with LLMs to provide insights into patent portfolios, including determining potential infringement risks

American Express | Site Reliability Engineer & Tooling Lead
January 2019 - April 2021 (Full Time)
June 2018 - January 2019 (Contractor)
